bug.author: rkooo567
bug.summary: Detached actor is broken when gcs actor management is on.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
Detached actor causes segfault when GCS actor management is on. <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Please provide a script that can be run to reproduce the issue. The script should have no external library dependencies (i.e., use fake or mock data / environments): Run tests/test_actor_advanced.py::test_detached_actor
I have verified my script runs in a clean environment and reproduces the issue. I have verified the issue also occurs with the latest wheels.
